item.title: Is it relevant? Who cares?
item.description: Recently, I discussed staying relevant in a constantly evolving field with a respected colleague. As someone with potentially decades in my career ahead, this is a topic I’ve been pondering, especially considering my specialization in Dynamics GP and how other technologies intersect with it. While I’m comfortable with my current skill set, I wonder if I should branch out and explore standalone technologies. My colleague reassured me that my experience, teaching abilities, and the continued relevance of Dynamics GP contribute to my value.
